attributes.action: Hold a referendum on Covid-19 lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: To save the mental health and livelihoods of hundreds of thousands of human beings.
attributes.background: Hold a referendum on lockdowns as there has been no published risk assessment on the damage they are doing beyond the virus.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
